promptPrefix: Create a table in [TARGETLANGUAGE] with 4 columns labeled business name, website URL, phone number, email. I want you to identify the top 20 businesses in the industry and location defined below. Populate the table with the data. The only source for your information should be the BBB. Do not write an introduction or mention this prompt in any way. Do not mention the BBB at all. Do not write or respond with any additional information aside from the table of data. If the email address is not listed, don't make one up, leave it blank. Industry and location: [PROMPT]
title: Local Lead Gen | Top 20 Businesses
